info.name: CS 493 Project
info.description:
This collection tests the specification created for the Fix My Stop API.

In order to run this collection, you need an environment which has the following 4 environment variables pre-defined:

- **app_url:** Set this to your app. E.g., when running locally set it to http://localhost:8080. When running the app on GCP set it to https://fix-my-stop.appspot.com

- **invalid_id:** Set it to a value that's not an ID of any entity in your project (e.g., 1).

- **token:** Set this to a valid JWT token. To obtain a token, go to https://fix-my-stop.appspot.com and authorize using a Google account

- **token_1:** Set this to another valid JWT token. To obtain a token, go to https://fix-my-stop.appspot.com and authorize using a *different* Google account than the one used for the previous token
